1.text: Truly, David had these sons, who were born to him in Hebron: the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelite; the second Daniel, from Abigail the Carmelite;

2.text: the third Absalom, the son of Maacah, daughter of Talmai, king of Geshur; the fourth Adonijah, the son of Haggith;

3.text: the fifth Shephatiah, of Abital; the sixth Ithream, from his wife Eglah.

4.text: Therefore, six were born to him in Hebron, where he reigned for seven years and six months. Then he reigned for thirty-three years in Jerusalem.

5.text: Now in Jerusalem, sons were born to him: Shammua, and Sobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, these four from Bathsheba, the daughter of Ammiel;

7.text: and Eliphelet, and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

8.text: indeed also Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

9.text: All these were sons of David, aside from the sons of the concubines. And they had a sister, Tamar.

10.text: Now the son of Solomon was Rehoboam, from whom Abijah conceived a son, Asa. And from him, there was born Jehoshaphat,

11.text: the father of Jehoram. And Jehoram conceived Ahaziah, from whom there was born Jehoash.

12.text: And his son, Amaziah, conceived Azariah. Then Jotham, the son of Azariah,

13.text: conceived Ahaz, the father of Hezekiah, from whom was born Manasseh.

14.text: Then too, Manasseh conceived Amon, the father of Josiah.

15.text: Now the sons of Josiah were these: the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

16.text: From Jehoiakim was born Jeconiah and Zedekiah.

17.text: The sons of Jeconiah the captive were: Shealtiel,

18.text: Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, and Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

19.text: From Pedaiah, there rose up Zerubbabel and Shimei. Zerubbabel conceived Meshullam, Hananiah, and their sister Shelomith,

20.text: as well as Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab-hesed, five.

21.text: Now the son of Hananiah was Pelatiah, the father of Jeshaiah, whose son was Rephaiah. And his son was Arnan, from whom was born Obadiah, whose son was Shecaniah.

22.text: The son of Shecaniah was Shemaiah, whose sons were these: Hattush, and Igal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six in number.

23.text: The sons of Neariah: Elioenai, and Hizkiaj, and Azrikam, three.

24.text: The sons of Elioenai: Hodaviah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
